headline: Looking At The Everest Group EG Narrative As Analyst Views And Valuation Assumptions Shift
summary: Everest Group’s latest valuation update nudges its fair value estimate slightly lower, with the model’s central price target trimmed from about US$367.93 to about US$363.36 per share as analysts balance mixed sector commentary on pricing and loss trends. Behind that shift, the revenue outlook has been reworked from an assumed 8.69% decline to a 2.54% decline, reflecting a view that conditions may still be tough but not as weak as previously built into the numbers. A slightly higher discount...
